department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 這堂概論課主要在提供學生於聽覺領域研究的介紹及討論。課程的第一部份涵蓋了聽覺科學領域的基本知識，包含聲音物理學、調頻調幅訊號(AM/FM)、心理物理學、聲音感知。學生將會學習到基本聲學原理、心理物理學、和用參數設計心理物理-聲學實驗。第二部份涵蓋高階層的聽覺認知議題介紹及討論，包含音樂認知、聽覺記憶、語言處理、音訊分流，聽覺場景分析與聽覺空間定位。目標在於提供學生聽覺研究裡不同領域的基礎知識，以利其發展日後聽覺領域或聽覺與溝通方面的相關研究。
goal.en: “This course is an advanced course that will provide students with knowledge and research experience of current topics in the auditory field. The first part of the course will cover basic knowledge in the areas of hearing science including the physics of sound, sound transmission, complex stimuli, sound analysis and the perception of sound. More advanced topics including threshold and sensitivity, frequency and temporal discrimination, masking, amplitude modulation and frequency modulation, and auditory scene analysis will also be discussed. Students will learn the basic principles of acoustics, psychophysical procedures, and the parameters used to design psychoacoustical experiments. Research in the area of higher-level auditory processing including music perception, melodic and rhythmic processing, vocal production,and sound stream segregation will also be discussed.“
